siteMetadata.description: This is Wasuwat's personal blog. He is a frontend web developer and he likes building a blazingly fast and beautiful websites.

node.excerpt: หลายคนอาจจะเคยเห็นคำสองคำนี้ผ่านหูผ่านตามาบ้าง และอาจจะงงว่ามันแตกต่างกันยังไง หรือหลายคนอาจจะยังไม่รู้จัก ในบทความนี้ เรามาดูกันว่า…

node.excerpt: I recently attend several interview sessions and thought of sharing things that I have discovered and learned throughout these interviews…

frontmatter.title: Why you should go to an interview every once in a while

node.excerpt: I started smoking since the age of 16. I thought it was cool and relaxing. It was the time that you get to chat with all your friends…

frontmatter.title: Best achievement of 2018 - I quit smoking
frontmatter.description: Story of why I start and I quit smoking after years of wasting money and destroying my own health.
